Articles.Content:
Just post your thanks for squad and KSP community here!

Here's mine:

Thank you Squad for this amazing game and for all of the knowledge it gave me. Maybe KSP is not the best game I've ever playd, but, I like it most.

> 
> [There's already a thread for that](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/7284-Thanks-KSP-team-%29). ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

But it's more about 1.0

> 
> But it's more about 1.0

That threads been around sense..... ever
